name: 2024 8th International Conference on High Performance Compilation, Computing and Communications (HP3C 2024)
content: Publication: The accepted paper will be included into HP3C 2024 Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1690-4) , which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
